{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/658106207","html_url":"https://github.com/panjf2000/ants/issues/99#issuecomment-658106207","issue_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/99","id":658106207,"node_id":"MDEyOklzc3VlQ29tbWVudDY1ODEwNjIwNw==","user":{"login":"panjf2000","id":7496278,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjc0OTYyNzg=","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/7496278?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000","html_url":"https://github.com/panjf2000","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"created_at":"2020-07-14T10:35:48Z","updated_at":"2020-07-14T10:35:48Z","author_association":"OWNER","body":"> 全局的话 试着放到init里面 貌似不行 而且全局的话 里面需要一个func

你直接用那个不需要 func 的 pool 就行了

> 就算每次创建 不是有过期回收的机制么(本地压测貌似是这样的) 但是出问题的场景 线上 通过看grafada就是一直增长的 还有刷pprof 也是缓慢增长的 按道理夜里没请求了 也应该下降啊.

定时清理默认是清理超过十秒没有被使用过的 workers，还是说你自己重置了这个时间？你可以写个简单的 demo 测试一下，看看定时清理有没有生效，还是说有 bug？总之先测试一下吧。","reactions":{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/658106207/reactions","total_count":0,"+1":0,"-1":0,"laugh":0,"hooray":0,"confused":0,"heart":0,"rocket":0,"eyes":0},"performed_via_github_app":null}

{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/663499049","html_url":"https://github.com/panjf2000/ants/issues/101#issuecomment-663499049","issue_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/101","id":663499049,"node_id":"MDEyOklzc3VlQ29tbWVudDY2MzQ5OTA0OQ==","user":{"login":"panjf2000","id":7496278,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjc0OTYyNzg=","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/7496278?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000","html_url":"https://github.com/panjf2000","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"created_at":"2020-07-24T11:42:48Z","updated_at":"2020-07-24T11:42:48Z","author_association":"OWNER","body":"动态化参数的需求一般是希望传递多个参数到 pool，目前这个需求可以通过上面所说的方式满足，短期内暂时不会支持动态化参数，因为这个会导致接口变更，按照开源软件版本更迭的规范，不向后兼容的接口变更需要升级到下一个大版本，目前 `ants` 并没有大的功能特性更新，所以不考虑升级到下一个大版本，这个功能等到下一个大版本升级的时候再带上。","reactions":{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/663499049/reactions","total_count":0,"+1":0,"-1":0,"laugh":0,"hooray":0,"confused":0,"heart":0,"rocket":0,"eyes":0},"performed_via_github_app":null}

{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/667649819","html_url":"https://github.com/panjf2000/ants/issues/102#issuecomment-667649819","issue_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/102","id":667649819,"node_id":"MDEyOklzc3VlQ29tbWVudDY2NzY0OTgxOQ==","user":{"login":"panjf2000","id":7496278,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjc0OTYyNzg=","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/7496278?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000","html_url":"https://github.com/panjf2000","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"created_at":"2020-08-02T09:20:20Z","updated_at":"2020-08-02T09:20:20Z","author_association":"OWNER","body":"你理解错了，只有在整个 worker goroutine 退出的时候才会放到 sync.Pool 里，而不是每次执行 task 之后都会放到 sync.Pool，看清楚，这部分逻辑是在 defer 里的。","reactions":{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/667649819/reactions","total_count":0,"+1":0,"-1":0,"laugh":0,"hooray":0,"confused":0,"heart":0,"rocket":0,"eyes":0},"performed_via_github_app":null}

{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/671229198","html_url":"https://github.com/panjf2000/ants/issues/105#issuecomment-671229198","issue_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/105","id":671229198,"node_id":"MDEyOklzc3VlQ29tbWVudDY3MTIyOTE5OA==","user":{"login":"panjf2000","id":7496278,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjc0OTYyNzg=","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/7496278?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000","html_url":"https://github.com/panjf2000","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"created_at":"2020-08-10T08:33:18Z","updated_at":"2020-08-10T08:33:18Z","author_association":"OWNER","body":"`ExpiryDuration` 不是你理解的意思，这个参数表示的是 `ants` 定时清理长时间未使用的 worker，比如设置 `ExpiryDuration` 为 1 0 秒，代表内部会每过 10s 清理一遍，检查每个超过 10s 没使用过的 worker，可能是注释的意思有歧义，我等会儿更新下代码注释。","reactions":{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/671229198/reactions","total_count":0,"+1":0,"-1":0,"laugh":0,"hooray":0,"confused":0,"heart":0,"rocket":0,"eyes":0},"performed_via_github_app":null}

{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/793340263","html_url":"https://github.com/panjf2000/ants/issues/138#issuecomment-793340263","issue_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/138","id":793340263,"node_id":"MDEyOklzc3VlQ29tbWVudDc5MzM0MDI2Mw==","user":{"login":"mayouzi","id":18528873,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjE4NTI4ODcz","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/18528873?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/mayouzi","html_url":"https://github.com/mayouzi","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/mayouzi/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/mayouzi/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/mayouzi/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/mayouzi/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/mayouzi/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/mayouzi/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/mayouzi/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/mayouzi/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/mayouzi/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"created_at":"2021-03-09T03:49:11Z","updated_at":"2021-03-09T03:49:11Z","author_association":"NONE","body":"> > 这个操作只能在具体的Task里去执行done吧，如果在invoke上下文进行add和done的话，Task如果执行时间稍微长点，那wait结束的时候，并未真正执行完
> > ```go
> > for ... {
> >     wg.Add(1)
> >     p.Invoke(args)
> >     wg.Done()
> > }
> > wg.Wait()
> > ```
> 
> 不是很懂你的意思

- 我的意思是invoke只是把task提交进pool，invoke的结束并不意味着task执行结束；
- 在task里面进行done操作倒是没有什么问题，都可以实现功能，只是想请教下ants本身是否提供了更优雅的方式去监控pool的worker执行状态(是否执行完毕等)

There will be always a separate goroutine that runs periodical jobs to clean up idle worker goroutines, which may cause the CPU consumption but still, 5% is not an expected amount.

If you don't want this goroutine to occupy too many system resources, I'd suggest you tune the `ExpiryDuration` option:

{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/800306572","html_url":"https://github.com/panjf2000/ants/issues/142#issuecomment-800306572","issue_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/142","id":800306572,"node_id":"MDEyOklzc3VlQ29tbWVudDgwMDMwNjU3Mg==","user":{"login":"sirodeneko","id":48661001,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjQ4NjYxMDAx","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/48661001?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/sirodeneko","html_url":"https://github.com/sirodeneko","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sirodeneko/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sirodeneko/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sirodeneko/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sirodeneko/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sirodeneko/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sirodeneko/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sirodeneko/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sirodeneko/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sirodeneko/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"created_at":"2021-03-16T14:28:21Z","updated_at":"2021-03-16T14:28:21Z","author_association":"NONE","body":"我懂你的意思了，是唤醒等待worker的进程,我一开始以为函数会不断的在goto语句中循环运行，现在仔细看了一下，发现原来函数会被阻塞在`p.cond.Wait()` ,所有函数都在等待唤醒。设计的原则是有空闲worker就用空闲worker,除非没有了才`p.workerCache.Get().(*goWorker)`对吧。如果采用`p.Running()<capacity` 会造成浪费。  ","reactions":{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/800306572/reactions","total_count":0,"+1":0,"-1":0,"laugh":0,"hooray":0,"confused":0,"heart":0,"rocket":0,"eyes":0},"performed_via_github_app":null}

{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/846580304","html_url":"https://github.com/panjf2000/ants/issues/157#issuecomment-846580304","issue_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/157","id":846580304,"node_id":"MDEyOklzc3VlQ29tbWVudDg0NjU4MDMwNA==","user":{"login":"panjf2000","id":7496278,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjc0OTYyNzg=","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/7496278?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000","html_url":"https://github.com/panjf2000","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"created_at":"2021-05-23T15:24:07Z","updated_at":"2021-05-23T15:24:22Z","author_association":"OWNER","body":"`blockingNum` 一开始只是个内部使用的变量，以前倒是没想到用户会希望拿到这个值，因为一开始考虑的是排队等待的数量应该是很小的，所以不需要持续去监控这个值。`blockingNum` 暴露出来倒不是不行，只是我不太清楚有多少用户有和你同样的需求，所以就先暂时不改吧，然后这个 issue 也暂时不关闭，如果有更多的用户提出需要拿到 `blockingNum`，那我再考虑去做。","reactions":{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/846580304/reactions","total_count":0,"+1":0,"-1":0,"laugh":0,"hooray":0,"confused":0,"heart":0,"rocket":0,"eyes":0},"performed_via_github_app":null}

{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/912384698","html_url":"https://github.com/panjf2000/ants/issues/183#issuecomment-912384698","issue_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/183","id":912384698,"node_id":"IC_kwDOB_z1Gs42YeK6","user":{"login":"automano","id":17286982,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjE3Mjg2OTgy","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/17286982?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/automano","html_url":"https://github.com/automano","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/automano/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/automano/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/automano/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/automano/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/automano/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/automano/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/automano/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/automano/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/automano/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"created_at":"2021-09-03T09:07:42Z","updated_at":"2021-09-03T09:07:42Z","author_association":"CONTRIBUTOR","body":"你这个图的逻辑是不是有点问题。yes或者no就两个结果，第三条线画出来有点难判断呀。是不是应该就是在yes那个分支后面？如果是的话，这个方法已经立即返回了。return nil之后，感觉我们自己去维护一个waiting list比较好，在框架外部实现自己的业务逻辑。加到ants的整体逻辑里面的话，关闭pool的时候还要考虑如何释放这个waiting list里面的资源。感觉有点魔改了。看作者怎么看到这个问题吧。一点小的个人意见。","reactions":{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/912384698/reactions","total_count":0,"+1":0,"-1":0,"laugh":0,"hooray":0,"confused":0,"heart":0,"rocket":0,"eyes":0},"performed_via_github_app":null}

{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/976133093","html_url":"https://github.com/panjf2000/ants/issues/197#issuecomment-976133093","issue_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/197","id":976133093,"node_id":"IC_kwDOB_z1Gs46Lpvl","user":{"login":"mogakun","id":29850480,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjI5ODUwNDgw","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/29850480?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/mogakun","html_url":"https://github.com/mogakun","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/mogakun/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/mogakun/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/mogakun/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/mogakun/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/mogakun/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/mogakun/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/mogakun/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/mogakun/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/mogakun/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"created_at":"2021-11-23T03:32:01Z","updated_at":"2021-11-23T03:32:01Z","author_association":"NONE","body":"100个worker都在调用submit，但是pool已经满了，要等worker释放，但是所有的worker都在等运行完自己的工作然后释放掉，但是自己的工作因为pool满了被阻塞了，一只无法释放掉。\r\n所以应该是建议在提交的任务之中不要涉及对pool的操作之类的动作。","reactions":{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/976133093/reactions","total_count":0,"+1":0,"-1":0,"laugh":0,"hooray":0,"confused":0,"heart":0,"rocket":0,"eyes":0},"performed_via_github_app":null}

{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/976183082","html_url":"https://github.com/panjf2000/ants/issues/197#issuecomment-976183082","issue_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/197","id":976183082,"node_id":"IC_kwDOB_z1Gs46L18q","user":{"login":"panjf2000","id":7496278,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjc0OTYyNzg=","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/7496278?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000","html_url":"https://github.com/panjf2000","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"created_at":"2021-11-23T05:45:15Z","updated_at":"2021-11-23T05:45:15Z","author_association":"OWNER","body":"事实上 ants 并不禁止 Submit() 里再调用同一个 Pool 的 Submit()。

> 另外初步分析了一下，Submit的task会被分配给pool中的worker。如果某个worker1执行task1，而task1又调用Submit task2，但task2恰好又被分给worker1，这样就锁住了。

其实这里的分析不正确，worker 如果正在执行任务是不会分配给其他任务的，这里之所以会阻塞是 @mogakun 所说那样，所以只需要设置一下 Pool 无可用 worker 时不阻塞即可：
```go
p, _ := ants.NewPool(1, ants.WithNonblocking(true))
```","reactions":{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/976183082/reactions","total_count":0,"+1":0,"-1":0,"laugh":0,"hooray":0,"confused":0,"heart":0,"rocket":0,"eyes":0},"performed_via_github_app":null}

{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/976191730","html_url":"https://github.com/panjf2000/ants/issues/197#issuecomment-976191730","issue_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/197","id":976191730,"node_id":"IC_kwDOB_z1Gs46L4Dy","user":{"login":"bigwhite","id":419088,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjQxOTA4OA==","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/419088?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/bigwhite","html_url":"https://github.com/bigwhite","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/bigwhite/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/bigwhite/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/bigwhite/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/bigwhite/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/bigwhite/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/bigwhite/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/bigwhite/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/bigwhite/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/bigwhite/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"created_at":"2021-11-23T06:11:54Z","updated_at":"2021-11-23T06:11:54Z","author_association":"NONE","body":"> 事实上 ants 并不禁止 Submit() 里再调用同一个 Pool 的 Submit()。
> 
> > 另外初步分析了一下，Submit的task会被分配给pool中的worker。如果某个worker1执行task1，而task1又调用Submit task2，但task2恰好又被分给worker1，这样就锁住了。
> 
> 其实这里的分析不正确，worker 如果正在执行任务是不会分配给其他任务的，这里之所以会阻塞是 @mogakun 所说那样，所以只需要设置一下 Pool 无可用 worker 时不阻塞即可：
> 
> ```go
> p, _ := ants.NewPool(1, ants.WithNonblocking(true))
> ```

这块感觉其实还是有些问题的。如果不设置ants.WithNonblocking(true)，我就是要阻塞。但这种阻塞应该是可以解开的。当task执行完毕后，自然可以空闲出一个goroutine来接新task。但问题就在于：如果我在Submit() 里再调用同一个 Pool 的 Submit()，一旦所有task都是这种情况，这个阻塞可能是无法解开的。

因此，是不是需要在ants文档中明确一下：如果要在submit再调用同一个pool的submit，需要设置ants.WithNonblocking(true)，并注意Submit可能返回的错误并适当处理这个错误。
","reactions":{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/976191730/reactions","total_count":0,"+1":0,"-1":0,"laugh":0,"hooray":0,"confused":0,"heart":0,"rocket":0,"eyes":0},"performed_via_github_app":null}

> > 
> > 
> > 其实这里的分析不正确，worker 如果正在执行任务是不会分配给其他任务的，这里之所以会阻塞是 @mogakun 所说那样，所以只需要设置一下 Pool 无可用 worker 时不阻塞即可：
> > ```go
> > p, _ := ants.NewPool(1, ants.WithNonblocking(true))
> > ```
> 
> 这块感觉其实还是有些问题的。如果不设置ants.WithNonblocking(true)，我就是要阻塞。但这种阻塞应该是可以解开的。当task执行完毕后，自然可以空闲出一个goroutine来接新task。但问题就在于：如果我在Submit() 里再调用同一个 Pool 的 Submit()，一旦所有task都是这种情况，这个阻塞可能是无法解开的。

我在文档里说明下。","reactions":{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/976691772/reactions","total_count":0,"+1":0,"-1":0,"laugh":0,"hooray":0,"confused":0,"heart":0,"rocket":0,"eyes":0},"performed_via_github_app":null}

{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/976729945","html_url":"https://github.com/panjf2000/ants/issues/196#issuecomment-976729945","issue_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/196","id":976729945,"node_id":"IC_kwDOB_z1Gs46N7dZ","user":{"login":"panjf2000","id":7496278,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjc0OTYyNzg=","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/7496278?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000","html_url":"https://github.com/panjf2000","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"created_at":"2021-11-23T15:35:10Z","updated_at":"2021-11-23T15:35:10Z","author_association":"OWNER","body":"这种情况是有可能的，因为 `Tune()` 函数只是原子地修改了内部的 `capacity` 变量，`Free()` 是通过计算 `capacity` - `Running()`，有可能你调用 `Tune()` 之后还有很多正在运行的 worker 没有退出，此时调用 `Free()` 就有可能返回负数，等到那些的 worker 执行完任务之后放回 pool，超出当前 `capacity` 的 worker 们将会自动退出，此时的 `Free()` 才是正确的数值。","reactions":{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/976729945/reactions","total_count":0,"+1":0,"-1":0,"laugh":0,"hooray":0,"confused":0,"heart":0,"rocket":0,"eyes":0},"performed_via_github_app":null}

{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/976733458","html_url":"https://github.com/panjf2000/ants/issues/196#issuecomment-976733458","issue_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/196","id":976733458,"node_id":"IC_kwDOB_z1Gs46N8US","user":{"login":"panjf2000","id":7496278,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjc0OTYyNzg=","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/7496278?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000","html_url":"https://github.com/panjf2000","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/panjf2000/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"created_at":"2021-11-23T15:37:22Z","updated_at":"2021-11-23T15:37:22Z","author_association":"OWNER","body":"另外，你这种用法的确不是很好，其实你可以在调用 `NewPool(capacity)` 时就指定很大的 capacity，ants 是按需扩容的，直到达到预设的 capacity，不需要频繁地调用 `Tune()` 函数去调整 capacity。","reactions":{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/976733458/reactions","total_count":0,"+1":0,"-1":0,"laugh":0,"hooray":0,"confused":0,"heart":0,"rocket":0,"eyes":0},"performed_via_github_app":null}

{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/992075987","html_url":"https://github.com/panjf2000/ants/issues/200#issuecomment-992075987","issue_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/200","id":992075987,"node_id":"IC_kwDOB_z1Gs47IeDT","user":{"login":"guowei-gong","id":62499904,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjYyNDk5OTA0","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/62499904?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/guowei-gong","html_url":"https://github.com/guowei-gong","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/guowei-gong/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/guowei-gong/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/guowei-gong/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/guowei-gong/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/guowei-gong/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/guowei-gong/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/guowei-gong/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/guowei-gong/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/guowei-gong/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"created_at":"2021-12-13T03:24:44Z","updated_at":"2021-12-13T03:24:44Z","author_association":"NONE","body":"> > 在我不需要重置资源的情况下，我是否不用去考虑调用 pool.Release() 释放资源呢？
> 
> 没看懂，说详细点。

抱歉。我尽力描述我的问题。
pool.Release() 用于释放资源。（使用默认的池时）是否每一次使用 ant.Submit()，都需要在代码中调用 pool.Release（显式）。它们需要像 Mutex 一样，一定要成对出现吗？","reactions":{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/panjf2000/ants/issues/comments/992075987/reactions","total_count":0,"+1":0,"-1":0,"laugh":0,"hooray":0,"confused":0,"heart":0,"rocket":0,"eyes":0},"performed_via_github_app":null}
